title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You might be experiencing a renewed appreciation for the simple value of freedom now. Your heart naturally goes out to those who are restricted from roaming freely; youre happy to provide loving attention to a neighbor or family member who is shut-in or ill. Your generosity with your time and resources can manifest in different ways, such as helping to clean, bringing groceries, or surprising them with sunny gifts. Good intentions are lovely, but acts of kindness demonstrate your love. Helen Keller wrote, The unselfish effort to bring cheer to others will be the beginning of a happier life for ourselves. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
